project_id.label: Project Id
project_id.help: The project ID from the Google Developer's Console. E.g. 'purple-grape-123'.

key_filename.label: Key Filename
key_filename.help: Full path to the a .json, .pem, or .p12 key downloaded from the Google Developers Console. NOTE: .pem and .p12 require you to specify config.email as well.
